title: Love & Betrayal
description: Zayne Wilson thinks he saved me. He didn’t.I would be better off dead. And if he knew the truth, he would agree.I can’t decide if Zayne is a monster I’m supposed to hate, or if he’s the one who will save me from all the others. Only time will tell, and mine is running out again.She’s off-limits. Forbidden. Untouchable.But I can’t stop wanting Giselle.I was hired to protect her.I thought I saved her, but I couldn’t have been more wrong.The truth is twisted, dark, and more horrific than I could ever have imagined.Now, I can’t walk away from the woman who owns my heart.I’ll do anything for Giselle … including die, if it sets her free.This full-length novel is a dark, enemies-to-lovers, forbidden, forced proximity romance standalone featuring an alpha hero that will stop at nothing to protect the woman he loves. Sizzling chemistry, all the feels, and edge-of-your-seat moments will have you glued to your kindle. No cheating, no cliffhanger, and a happily ever after guaranteed!TW (Please see the author's note on the inside).
author: J.A. Owenby
